title: Paul Murphy – 2003 Speech to Labour Party Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by the then Northern Ireland Secretary, Paul Murphy, at the 2013 Labour Party Conference in Bournemouth on 2nd October 2003.
